CustomField.description: Contains value of purchases prior to the date of a SGM. If they sold them anything on the date of the unit purchase other than the unit it will not show here. It is maintained by exporting a copy of Purchases Before SGM report and a copy of all accounts that have Purchased a Steel Green Unit? = true. Then run this script https://github.com/ahephner/pythonUdemy/blob/master/Python%20basics/produced_docs/sgm_before_purchase.py
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Summary of total purchases prior to Steel Green Unit
CustomField.label: Purchases Before SG Unit
